        public Server​(int port)

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)

      • start

        public void start()
        Start method of the server. Use this to start up the server.

      • run

        public void run()
        Override from runnable. Called once the thread of the server has started. For each new connection a new ClientHandler instance is created and added to the list of all ClientHandlers.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • requestGame

        public void requestGame​(ClientHandler requestingClient)
        Called by the ClientHandler to request a game in the Server. If there is nobody in the queue the CH goes into queue otherwise new game is started and marked in games.
        Parameters:
        requestingClient - client handler that request a game

      • recordMove

        public void recordMove​(Move move,
                       java.lang.String gameId)
        Records the move when ClientHandlers gets a move. Gets the game by the gameId and playes the move on the board of that game. Also checks for the game over condition by checking a winner or if there is a draw board. Sends the made move back to all the client handlers from the game.
        Parameters:
        move - model of the move
        gameId - uuid of the game

      • getPort

        public int getPort()
        Getter.
        Returns:
        port of the server

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops the server from running.

      • addClientHandler

        public void addClientHandler​(ClientHandler handler)

      • removeClientHandler

        public void removeClientHandler​(ClientHandler handler)

      • disconnectClientHandlerFromGame

        public void disconnectClientHandlerFromGame​(ClientHandler handler,
                                            java.lang.String gameId)
        Called by ClientHandler while disconnecting. When ClientHandler suddenly stops it informs other player in the game about the disconnect.
        Parameters:
        handler - disconnection
        gameId - game id to be disconnected from

      • getClientHandlerUsernames

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getClientHandlerUsernames()
        Called by ClientHandler to get the list of client handler usernames.
        Returns:
        list of connected client handler usernames

      • isClientHandlerUsernameTaken

        public boolean isClientHandlerUsernameTaken​(java.lang.String requestedName)
        Called by ClientHandler to get check if the username is taken.
        Parameters:
        requestedName - requested name of client
        Returns:
        is client handler username taken
